sense.def:
One's credentials
so človekovi prejšnji dosežki, šole in splošno znanje, ki kažejo, da je usposobljen za neko delo.

seg.quote: His credentials as a journalist were beyond dispute.

sense.def:
Credentials
je tudi pismo ali potrdilo, ki dokazuje človekovo identiteto ali usposobljenost.

seg.quote: Didn't you ask for his credentials?
